q: Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so,'' David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Sabol.`` When Allen Iverson started wearing it, it was for a purpose- to keep elbow swelling down and protect it from further injury- and then he sparked a fad,'' Sabol said. From a sports medicine perspective, the sleeve does offer a little bit of compression, keeps the joint warm and can be fitted with a pad to protect the elbow from further injury when players dive on the floor. That's mainly why Dwyane Wade wears one, because of the physical nature of his game. But for many athletes, it's more that they like how it looks and feel good wearing it. I think pocket presence is something that you can learn a little bit, but a lot of it is just feeling your way through that, knowing when to stay in there and when to get out. I think I've done a better job over the last season of knowing when to get out and when to hang in there.
